title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 1. These regulations may be cited as the Greyhound Industry (Control
text_raw:
1. These regulations may be cited as the Greyhound Industry (Control 
Committee and Control Appeal Committee) (Provisional Extension of Term of 
Office) Regulations, 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) (provisional extension term office) regulation 2021

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 2. The Greyhound Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal
text_raw:
2. The Greyhound Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal 
Committee) Regulations, 2007 to 2020 and these Regulations may be cited 
together as the Greyhound Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal 
Committee) Regulations, 2007 to 2021.
text_norm: 2 greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) regulation 2007 2020 regulation may cited together greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) regulation 2007 2021

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: In these Regulations, -
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, - 

“the Regulations of 2016” means the Greyhound Industry (Control Committee 
and Control Appeal Committee) (Provisional Extension of Term of Office) 
Regulations, 2016 (S.I. No. 491 of 2016), and 

 “the Regulations of 2020” means the Greyhound Industry (Control Committee 
and Control Appeal Committee) (Provisional Extension of Term of Office) 
Regulations, 2020 (S.I. No. 317 of 2020).
text_norm: 3 regulation - regulation 2016 mean greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) (provisional extension term office) regulation 2016 (s.i no 491 2016) regulation 2020 mean greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) (provisional extension term office) regulation 2020 (s.i no 317 2020)

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 4. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 5(1) (v) of the Greyhound
text_raw:
4. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 5(1) (v) of the Greyhound 
Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal Committee) Regulations 2007 
(S.I. No. 301 of 2007), the term of office of the members of the Control 
Committee who were last appointed to the Control Committee on the 29th day of 
August, 2013, and whose term of office was extended to eight years by the 
Regulations of 2020, is hereby further extended from eight years to nine years.
text_norm: 4 notwithstanding provision article 5(1) (v) greyhound industry (control committee control appeal committee) regulation 2007 (s.i no 301 2007) term office member control committee last appointed control committee 29th day august 2013 whose term office extended eight year regulation 2020 hereby extended eight year nine year

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 5. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 11(1) (v) of the Greyhound
text_raw:
5. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 11(1) (v) of the Greyhound 
Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal Committee) Regulations 2007, 
the term of office of the members of the Control Appeal Committee who were 
last appointed to the Control Appeal Committee on the 3rd day of October, 2013, 
and whose term of office was extended to eight years by the Regulations of 2020, 
is hereby further extended from eight years to nine years. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [263] 3

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 6. Where any member of the Control Committee or the Control Appeal
text_raw:
6. Where any member of the Control Committee or the Control Appeal 
Committee dies, retires or otherwise ceases to be a member of such Committee, 
or where any member has indicated that they are not available to serve on the 
Committee beyond the eight years provided for by the Regulations of 2020, the 
Board may appoint a person to such Committee to take the place of that member 
for the duration of the term of office set out in these regulations.
text_norm: 6 member control committee control appeal committee dy retires otherwise cease member committee member indicated available serve committee beyond eight year provided regulation 2020 board may appoint person committee take place member duration term office set regulation

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 7. A member of the Control Committee appointed to such Committee in
text_raw:
7. A member of the Control Committee appointed to such Committee in 
accordance with Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2016 shall, for the purposes 
of these Regulations, be deemed to have been appointed to such Committee on 
the 29th day of August, 2013.
text_norm: 7 member control committee appointed committee accordance regulation 5 regulation 2016 shall purpose regulation deemed appointed committee 29th day august 2013

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: 8. These regulations shall come into effect on the 28th day of August 2021.
text_raw:
8. These regulations shall come into effect on the 28th day of August 2021. 

GIVEN under the Seal of Rásaíocht Con Éireann 
 this 27th day of May 2021 

FRANK NYHAN, 
 Chairman of the Board 

GERARD DOLLARD 
 Chief Executive Officer 

 An officer authorised by the Board to authenticate the Seal of the Board 

L 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [263]

title: Act 1958 (No. 12 of 1958), as amended by Section 9 of the Horse and Greyhound
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
Interpretation.) 

The effect of these regulations is, pending the consideration of primary 
legislation establishing a new Control Committee and Appeal Committee, to 
extend the term of office of members of the current Control Committee and the 
Control Appeal Committee for a further year. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [263] 5
